CustomField.formula: CASE( Priority , "Critical", "Critical production issue including system unavailability and data integrity issues with no workaround available.", "Urgent", "Major functionality is impacted or significant performance degradation is experienced. Issue is persistent and affects many users and/or major functionality. No reasonable workaround available. Also includes time sensitive requests.", "High", "Software issue affecting some but not all users. Short term workaround is available, but not sustainable.", "Medium", "Inquiry regarding software functionality, navigation, installation or configuration; software issue affecting a small number of users with a reasonable workaround available.", "")
CustomField.label: Explanation of Priority
